name: Boom Town
description:
In our Monthly Ad-Free game of September, Using dynamite and a single Anvil try to catch a Road Runner that has been taunting you. In this Physics based puzzle game use explosions to navigate different levels and find a way to finally catch your rival.

Drag bombs onto the scene that activate when close to your anvil to blow up a path to your elusive rival.

See how fast and how few bombs you can use to get there.

___________________________

Check out all of our Ad-Free monthly games on our profile or at ivorycrowgames.com and be sure to give us a follow on Facebook to keep up with all our updates. 
___________________________

Feel free to leave us a nice comment or review if you like our game and be sure to share it with your friends!

Thanks!
